password_requirement_intro.fr: Le mot de passe doit remplir les critères suivants
password_requirement_intro.en: The password must meet the following criteria

password_requirement_special.fr: include au moins un charatère spécial
password_requirement_special.en: include at least one special character

password_requirement_text.fr: inclure au moins une lettre en majuscule
password_requirement_text.en: include at least one uppercase letter

signup_google_facebook.en: Sign up with Google or Facebook
